full_threads.body:
Hi @joel,

https://simplysolarsolutions.com.au/ recently moved IT providers and Gravity Form notifications aren’t coming through to their email > support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au

Can you please look into this and see if there are any tweaks that can be made at our end?

Hi Chris,
Please see Jas email below.

Are you able to assist at all.


Thanks Shantell

From: Jeff Bains | Exceed IT Sales <sales@exceedit.com.au <mailto:sales@exceedit.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 28 October 2024 11:53 AM
To: Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Simply Solar Solutions | Website form issue + submission volume.

Hi Shantell we don't have any additional 365 email filters as such. Can you have the web people let us know what email address and engine they are using? Do we need to add in an SPF record etc for the web hosting server IP address for simply solar solutions? This may have been done already.

Happy to work with the web guys on this but don't have much to go on at this stage

Kind Regards
Exceed Support Team
Managed Services | Cloud Solutions | Cyber Security
support@exceedit.com.au <mailto:support@exceedit.com.au>

Shantell
